lines.text:
[scared]
I'm getting weird vibes, man...

[staring down on him]
What kind of vibes?
I'm thinkin' you wanna hurt me...
I'm not gunna hurt you, Tweasel...

[relieved]
You're not?
No. I'm gunna kill you.

[to Ricky]
You're not listening. It's 'string up'. He wants you to 'string up'.
[after first stabbing Tweasel]
Say you love Satan. Go on.
No. I love my mom.

[stabs again]
Say it. Say you love Satan.
Come on, you guys. Blow out your candle and say you love Satan.
I didn't have to kill Tweasel... I wanted to.
[about rehab]
What kinda drugs they give ya in there? Lithium right?
No, I think it was like Haldon.
Haldon?
[thinking]
Haldon... Haldon... fuck, I usually know my drugs.
[pause]
Ohhh... you're a little schizo, huh?
I can't go to the library. It's too relaxing. Every time I go, I gotta shit.
[prompting Ricky to steal the book about Satanism]
Go on, boy, feel the heat.
